Header: Female lance corporal on training found dead
Content: A lance corporal of the Sri Lanka army that had arrived at the Kothalawela Defence Academy for rowing training was found dead in her hostel room. The police stated that after she was found collapsed in her hostel room she was rushed to the Kalubowila Hospital for further treatment where she was pronounced dead. The Mount Lavinia police stated that the deceased Lace Corporal S. K. Maragoda hailed from the Warakapola region. Her autopsy is scheduled to be performed today.
